727400.name: A Matter of Murder - More Wallpapers
727400.description:
Thank You For Purchasing A Matter of Murder!

For our latest update, we have prepared the following Wallpaper Set for you to download. We hope that you enjoy it.
A Matter of Murder Wallpaper Set
Featuring 4 Suspects: Major Thomas, Rector Qualms, Airman Penelope, Ward Constance, as well as various achievements in the form of newspaper clippings.

Files will download to the following folder on your computer inside a directory of: ...Steam\steamapps\common\A Matter of Murder\
727400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
